name: test_app_peer_address
description:
arrange: build and deploy the flask charm.
    act: add a unit and request env variables through the unit IP addresses.
    assert: the peer address must be present in the units' env.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: build and deploy the flask charm.
act: add a unit and request env variables through the unit IP addresses.
assert: the peer address must be present in the units' env.
